ud7.2:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava savatthiyam viharati jetavane anathapindikassa arame.
ud7.2:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena ayasma sariputto ayasmantam lakundakabhaddiyam sekham mannamano bhiyyoso mattaya anekapariyayena dhammiya kathaya sandasseti samadapeti samuttejeti sampahamseti.
ud7.2:2.1: Addasa kho bhagava ayasmantam sariputtam ayasmantam lakundakabhaddiyam sekham mannamanam bhiyyoso mattaya anekapariyayena dhammiya kathaya sandassentam samadapentam samuttejentam sampahamsentam.
